title: TN MRB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Assistant Medical Officer Posts
description: The Tamil Nadu Medical Services Recruitment Board (TN MRB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Assistant Medical Officer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, BHMS, Diploma, and Post-graduation can apply for the TN MRB Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.Â  Here we have mentioned the educatio...
